caption.p: Methanol tolerance and stability comparison between M +S +C900-900 and Pt/C in O 2-saturated 0.1 M KOH. (a) Current–time ( i– t) responses at +0.88 V, with the addition of 1 M methanol at 1200 s. (b) Normalized current–time profiles at +0.88 V, at a rotation rate of 900 rpm. (c,d) LSV curves obtained with freshly prepared catalysts (solid traces) and after storage in the electrolyte solution for 60 days (dashed traces): (c) M +S +C900-900 and (d) Pt/C. Electrode rotation rate: 1600 rpm and potential scan rate: 10 mV s –1.
